title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g., org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. I would like clarification on what the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' means.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant).
3. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy.
4. Observe the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
